displayProperties.description:
Eris will contact you through the Crown of Sorrow once she has formulated a new plan, and encourages you to continue to explore the Derelict Leviathan and contain its Nightmares in the meantime.

This quest will progress at the next weekly reset.
displayProperties.name: Legacy: Bound in Sorrow

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Reactivate Vestige of Dread rewards at the Crown of Sorrow.

Obtain Vestiges of Dread from
 Opening chests and completing patrols on the Derelict Leviathan
 Completing playlist activities
 Defeating Nightmares anywhere in the system
 Defeating combatants anywhere in the system

setData.questStepSummary: Failure does not mean loss. It means an opportunity to reassess and find a new approach. Just as Crow's failure led to success, so too could Zavala's. Eris needs to contemplate the next steps in the ritual of severance, and in the meantime it falls on you to contain the growing threat within the Leviathan as best as you can.

setData.questStepSummary: In order to perform another attempt at the ritual of severance, Eris requires more essence of Nightmares to be contained in the Crown of Sorrow. Venture across the Leviathan and beyond to fight and defeat Nightmares to fuel the ritual.

displayProperties.name: Legacy: Bound in Sorrow

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Reactivate Vestige of Dread rewards at the Crown of Sorrow.

Obtain Vestiges of Dread from
 Opening chests and completing patrols on the Derelict Leviathan
 Completing playlist activities
 Defeating Nightmares anywhere in the system
 Defeating combatants anywhere in the system

setData.questStepSummary: Zavala is eager to get this ritual of severance over with. He refuses to talk about his experiences with his Nightmare, and wants to put this all behind him. Confident that you will succeed, he awaits the trip to the Underbelly of the Leviathan to bring this all to a close.

displayProperties.description:
Complete tiers of the Nightmare Containment public event within the Derelict Leviathan and bind your Vestiges of Dread at the Nightmare Harvester after completing the final tier to create a Bound Presence.

Each additional time you bind after completing the final tier has a chance to reward a Bound Presence.

displayProperties.description:
was I still alive? Still not dead, as I dreamed?

Me treasure not sunken, not lost in the deep?

They'd caught not their quarry, I would be redeemed

And bury me knife in their chests while they sleep
displayProperties.name: Legacy: Cryptic Quatrains III

Captain's Coins are used as donations toward improvements in the Eliksni Quarter and can be exchanged at the Donations Chest in the Tower Courtyard.

Captain's Coins can be earned by completing Ketchcrash and Expedition activities, opening chests, and completing Lost Sectors during Season of Plunder.

displayProperties.description:
Mara's discovery has called for a change in strategy. You must now hold the line against the Wrathborn without bringing the power of the Warsats to bear against them.

However, you still cannot allow Eramis to gain control of the Warsats either. Continue collecting submind data until Rasputin comes up with a new plan.
displayProperties.name: More Than a Weapon

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Obtain Seraph Key Codes from completing activities.
Seraph Chests can be found in the Heist Battlegrounds playlist (accessed by opening the H.E.L.M. from the Director) and require {var:2802605899} Seraph Key Codes to unlock.
This quest will progress at the next weekly reset.

setData.questStepSummary: Rasputin will contact you once he has devised a new course of action.
